about.bio: I am a Full Stack developer passionate about creating innovative technological solutions. I specialize in efficient and scalable web applications, using the latest technologies to deliver high-quality results. I also have a strong interest in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Deep Learning.

faq.paymentAnswer: 50% upfront, 50% on completion. I accept transfers and PayPal
